oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā Sharḥ al-Raḥbīyah / lil-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah ... al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī : manuscript, 1697
Sharḥ al-Raḥbīyah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Suyūṭī , 1445-1505
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy completed 13 Ramaḍān 1108 [April 5, 1697] in the hand of Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Najāḥī al-Shāfiʻī.

Waqf statement (f. 21r): "Waqafa ... jamīʻ hādhā al-kitāb al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Birmāwī ʻalá ṭalabat al-ʻilm al-sharīf bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azhar wa-jaʻala maqarrahu bi-khizānah bi-Ḥārrat al-Danāshirah waqfan ṣaḥīḥan sharʻīyan lā yubāʻ wa-lā yūhab wa-lā yurhan ..."
Bound with: Risālah fī bayān maʻná al-tafsīr wa-bayānal-nisbah baynahu wa-bayna al-taʼwīl wa-dhikr mawḍūʻihi wa-ghāyatihi wa-istimdādih / Muḥammad al-Shawbarī.
MS Arab 350. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ibn al-Mutafanninah, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī--1103 or 1104-1181 or 1182
Inheritance and succession (Islamic law)
Shafiites
